channel.title: Comments on: Episode #185: Blockchain Solutions & Boosie Badazz

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description: Great show. I was disappointed with the conference overall but did enjoy meeting Nick and Hunter! Boosie Badazz Cool!
item.content:encoded: Great show. I was disappointed with the conference overall but did enjoy meeting Nick and Hunter! Boosie Badazz Cool!
